allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "cd /d d:\\m-vecinu && npm install && echo DONE")
Bash(powershell -Command "Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList ''/c cd /d d:\\m-vecinu && npm install 2>&1'' -Wait -NoNewWindow")
Bash(powershell -Command "Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList ''/c cd /d d:\\m-vecinu && npx prisma generate 2>&1'' -Wait -NoNewWindow")
Bash(powershell -Command "Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList ''/c cd /d d:\\m-vecinu && npm run build 2>&1'' -Wait -NoNewWindow")
